website_summaries.verdict: It's pricey, but it's still a good option if you're looking for an all-natural baby powder that works on sensitive skin.
pros: Talc-free powder made from organic ingredients
cons: A few have complained about the packaging leaking powder

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but maybe unnecessary?
customer_reviews.text: This has well-sourced ingredients and smells nice. It's convenient to have baby powder to get sand off after the beach, etc. However, it's not inexpensive, and after looking at the ingredient list, I realized I could have just put some of the organic cornstarch and arrowroot powder that I already have in my kitchen into a shaker bottle and probably accomplished the same thing. Be careful if packing this -- the lid on the container can rotate open and the powder will make a big mess.
customer_reviews.author: The Purista

customer_reviews.title: This works great and smells good
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use as dry shampoo in my hair, since it seemed impossible to find a non-toxic dry shampoo. This works great and smells good. It's also great to know that I am not harming my body with toxins and carcinogens.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: EWG Approved
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and it is approved by the Environmental Working Group. Their website list and analyze the ingredients. To use a product safely is very important to me. I'm thankful for this powder.
customer_reviews.author: Louise B

customer_reviews.title: A good alternative to ointments.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has had diaper rash for months, that seemed to get worse when I used zinc based ointments on it. Plus, she acted like the ointment hurt her. She is happy to have this powder applied, and the diaper rash was much better after the 3 days that I used it on her. It has a very pleasant scent, too. It's a little pricey, but maybe it's worth the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: Grits53

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this item and that it feels light when you put it on. It works really great too and my family uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Works well to remove sand from skin, but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: We dont normally use baby powder as part of our diaper routine. We bought this to use at the beach to help remove sand and it worked very well! was very soft on my daughter's skin (shes almost 2). The only thing i dont like is the price point, its very expensive and you don't get a huge bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: A must get for every baby
customer_reviews.text: Smell very nice, and last quite long. A general tips: pour this on your palm first, then even the powder out on both palms before applying on the infant. Do not pour the powder directly on the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Linkin Pork

customer_reviews.title: the product is great if you can get it out!
customer_reviews.text: i like the product. but it’s a little too expensive to have issues with the top of the container.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: I truly love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this brand. Every product I've tried from them delivers. Both this and the calendula lotion are staples in our house. This is great for not just babies but adults who get chaffing and heat rashes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Helps with bulldog allergies/skin
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my bulldogs. They are highly allergic to so many things. The powder calms the area in their skin.
customer_reviews.author: cindy silk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells nice and keeps my daughter's feet drier on hot days
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this line
customer_reviews.text: I wish more people and especially moms put more effort into knowing what was going on and in them and their families. All of the California Baby products are great and well rated on the cosmetics database. I have two babies and this does what it should. My only gripe is getting it open the first time. I have the husband perform this task.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle_family

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love knowing this doesn't have talc or other chemicals. Works just like other baby powders, doesn't seem to compromise on quality or the way it works at all even though it doesn't have talc. Really nice smell. My favorite baby powder.
customer_reviews.author: Peeshka

customer_reviews.title: gentle baby powder
customer_reviews.text: My 17 months old son has sensitive skin. I used to use ointment for his diaper but since he started ichying around the area. I switched to this product. The scent is very nice and he doesn't itch anymore.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this but not a fan of lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of all ca baby products but for some reason the lavender scent is not working for me. I wanted a more baby powder smell but it's neither lavender nor baby powder.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the texture, very bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: This baby powder is not smooth. It feels quite rough for a baby. Keeps skin dry, so does the job. Packaging is very bad. Even when it's in closed position the powder comes out easily. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Knomad

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels wonderful! I also really liked their business card that ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product! Smells and feels wonderful! I also really liked their business card that was included, well done!
customer_reviews.author: DaisyJade

customer_reviews.title: ... expensive for the amount you receive but it smells great and works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive for the amount you receive but it smells great and works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jan P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with the safety of the ingredients. I like how it works. It has a subtle but pleasant smell. I received the first canister of California Baby Non-Talc Powder "Calming" as a baby gift. It lasted about 10 months being used on daily basis. When I ran out I didn't hesitate to purchase this powder again.
customer_reviews.author: BC Ezerega

customer_reviews.title: If you are sensitive to smells, watch out!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this no stars were that an option! The smell was so overpowering I would never use on my little one. The packaging was very poor as well and this ended up leaking powder over my other item.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but I wish there was more
customer_reviews.text: For the price I really wish there was more. The powder has a great smell. I place it in my shoes to keep them dry and fresh when I wear them barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent does the job. The only thing wrong is the price to expensive for baby powder other the that it's great
customer_reviews.author: loida

customer_reviews.title: Good product, thank you!
customer_reviews.text: It is a Great powder for babies. And I ordered it for my friends who have been using this powder for years. They love it and it is a good value item from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Fairyferry

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture and no overwhelming fragrance
customer_reviews.text: No harsh fragrance, very smooth, light powder. Doesn't smell like "baby powder." Better than Burt's Bees which has an unusual texture and smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Adult
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as an adult with sensitive skin and very satisfied! I recommend for others as a natural alternative to baby powder.
customer_reviews.author: ECat

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: i really like this powder... its pretty pricey, but worked well and has a really nice scent. i recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: andmic

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new grandson. This is an excellent product and works really good on his diaper area. It is a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Baby Powder
customer_reviews.text: I love everything from the California Baby line. I can't find a place to buy the baby powder where I live so I've just been ordering it on Amazon.com. This powder is very lightly scented. Unlike other powders, when you use it, the fragrance and powder itself don't linger in the air making some babies cry when used too close to them.
customer_reviews.author: bgalera13

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great powder, removes excess moisture from the skin which helps to prevent diaper rash. It's not overly "dusty" and feels silky. My daughter has very sensitive skin and this product works great for her.
customer_reviews.author: TeaGlaze

customer_reviews.title: love that it is no talc
customer_reviews.text: This powder works great and I love it because it is not bad for my little girls. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: soothing and healing
customer_reviews.text: this product has been a life savor. baby occassionally gets some heat rashes and this talc not only helps soothe but also heals the rash. very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Dispensing problem
customer_reviews.text: The powder on its own is good, however the dispensing holes for the container do not work well at all. The product is dispensed in chunks instead of nice loose powder, why is very frustrating. I have physically transfer the powder into a different container and manually add to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ioana Nicolescu

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: California Baby Non-Talc Powder, Canister - Calming, 2.5-Ounce it's smells very good and absorbd quickly .i love california baby ! i recomed this .
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: It was part of a gift again I should pay more attention to ounces will again go to the store to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Franklin

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: buy for my friend,she say it's ok it's good buy for my friend,she say it's ok it's very good when the summer come soon
customer_reviews.author: summerxx

customer_reviews.title: How to open it?
customer_reviews.text: When I need it, I am confused. How to open it? I cannot find any instruction on the product and cannot find information from web.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully. My 4 month-old started to sleep 11hrs at ...
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. My 4 month-old started to sleep 11hrs at night and about to have serious diaper rash. Tried butt paste, skin protectant gel, and vasiline but none worked. I used the power twice and his skin drastically improved already. Plus it smells so lovely!
customer_reviews.author: A. Vu

customer_reviews.title: Made my baby’s skin peel off
customer_reviews.text: I would give this no stars if possible, it becamea horrible paste that stuck to my baby’s skin and peeled it off never buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gutierrez-Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Wonder powder!!
customer_reviews.text: I Have used this for 10 years. My 5 year old recently had an eczema outbreak from some polyester winter tights, and this powder, from when my son used it, still works amazingly!! And pretty much over night! If I have a little blemish, myself, I’ll use it and it disappears! Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Modestfay

customer_reviews.title: The powder itself is fine, but the container needs to be changed
customer_reviews.text: The powder itself is fine, but the container needs to be changed. The top came off the first time I used it and would not stay in place. That made controlling the amount of powder hard to control. Similar non-talc powders have a simple flip top dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: booklady

customer_reviews.title: Good for sand at beach
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the beach. Wanted something without the normal chemicals. Works exactly like regular baby powder but smells better
customer_reviews.author: Loves the Beach

customer_reviews.title: Powder Power :)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this powder. I make chunky babies and it’s hard to keep those skin folds dry and happy. This does the trick every time :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby rolls
customer_reviews.text: We use this every night on our baby after bath time in all of her little rolls and skin folds. Doing this cleared up some red bumps my baby had started getting in the crease on the back of her neck, and has prevented it from coming back. I highly recommend this as it is also safer for baby than talc powder. It also has a nice clean fresh smell.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried 2 organic brands before, but weren’t as good, it’s very clean and fine powder but it’s too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It smells nice and spreads well. We use it right before bed after every bath for our daughter. Seems to make her feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TWest

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this powder
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this powder. Kind of expensive, but well worth it in my opinion. Going to purchase again once I’m out!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz2317

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby/toddlers with eczema! Also helps clear diaper rashes quickly.
customer_reviews.author: E.V.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife: she said it's exactly what she wanted. She says it works great for her.
customer_reviews.author: ACS

customer_reviews.title: All natural but gave my daughter worst diaper rash ever seen
customer_reviews.text: There is something in this natural powder that made my daughter break out in the worst rash, it took over 5 days of Desitin to treat it. Once I stopped using this powder, she stopped having the irritation and rash.
customer_reviews.author: tarynm

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder! Great smell. Wanted alum-free / talc free, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle S.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth texture, all natural powder and dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Silky soft baby powder with gentle " light hint of lavender" smell. I use for my kids, self and even as a dry shampoo! Love that it's safe and talc free.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for many uses
customer_reviews.text: This natural powder is amazing. It is not only for babies as my son is almost 3 and we are still using it! Not only for diaper rash but for mild foot fungus or just about anything. Good for adults too. And I love that it has natural ingredients and no heavy smell. It is pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Q

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as promised. Great product to avoid using talc-based baby powder
customer_reviews.author: acecards

customer_reviews.title: Not for my baby.
customer_reviews.text: When I use this product and Huggies Natural Care wipes together, my baby's bottom turned fire red. Poor thing. Not willing to try it again. It happened twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great alternative to Gold Bond powder. Works well, and scent is very light.
customer_reviews.author: ECgirlinCA

customer_reviews.title: the only powder i will use for my son
customer_reviews.text: This powder is wonderful and is talc free. Also it is vegan and we have noticed prevents diaper rash. Definitely a must have for healthy babies!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: We use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Every time my daughter has a heat rash, or any kind of rash/eczema, I use this baby powder and it works wonderfully. I also like that it is talc-free!
customer_reviews.author: Bdazzle

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Great smell, Great company, Great packaging, Great product. Great everything! Love it. I love everything California Baby!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Good powder
customer_reviews.text: Very calm and soothing Non-Talc powder, sometimes it can clump together so that can be a little frustrating but all in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: O.Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this powder from Whole Foods and Amazon. The price is similar. We use it pretty infrequently but it helps with the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Misty M

customer_reviews.title: great powder but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture and scent of this powder. I do think people should know that it does contain tea tree oil which is a phytoestrogen, so if you are buying it to avoid phthalates and synthetic fragrances, you will be getting this instead. It has a nice drying effect, and is silky to the touch. I do think it helped clear up my baby's diaper rash.
customer_reviews.author: astase

customer_reviews.title: mmmm- awesome powder
customer_reviews.text: This is my second favorite baby powder (My first is Klorane Bebe, and not available in the US) It smells awesome and doesn't irritate my son's bum. Or mine!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended..
customer_reviews.text: Not too impressed. Product clumps together and the container lid opens too easily, making it easy to spill everywhere. The product quality is decent, but I wouldn't buy again. I prefer burt's bees baby powder!
customer_reviews.author: Don Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but fantastic...
customer_reviews.text: As with all California Baby products, it's definitely pricier than other powders but its quality is bar-none. Really helped prevent/alleviate diaper rash and love that it's not scented.
customer_reviews.author: Bellsa Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: This powder seemed pricey but the scent is great and it is comforting to not worry about talc and other chemicals. It does the job!
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: great cornstarch powder
customer_reviews.text: As my husband says, this powder makes babies happy! It smells herbal like lavender. It works well. We've had no diaper rash on our twin boys. We use it in their diaper area, under their chins and on the backs of their legs in the folds.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Cured my baby's bum
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that helped my 12 month olds terrible diaper rash, I use it all the time. I like that is has natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Karson

customer_reviews.title: perfect for baby...if you can afford it...
customer_reviews.text: It isn't easy to find baby products that are truly non-toxic and organic. California Baby seems to be nailing it. This works fantastic on my daughters sensitive butt. The 4 star review is solely due to the price. The very tiny 2.5 oz container is almost $17. Regular baby powder is more like $10 for 66 oz. The ingredient list does not justify that price point!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: this product is for my born daughter. After some times using, I find it is better than other products. It let me feels smooth
customer_reviews.author: jayhb

product_meta.title: California Baby Organic Powder - Calming - 2.5 oz
